bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom butted Aluminum with PowerCurve down tube, Tri shaped top tube, Oversized seat tube and Integrated tapered head tube, double water bottle mounts

components.description: Fuji A2-SL, custom butted Aluminum with Edge S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger
ROCKSHOX Recon Silver TK Solo Air Taper 100mm travel w/ PopLoc Remote LockOut
Shimano SLX Hollow Tech II w/Integrated spindle, 24/32/42T
Wellgo ATB w/steel cage, toe clips and straps
Shimano XT SGS Shadow Top normal 10sp
Fuji Custom 32H MTB Disc Hubs with Alex DP17 rims, Double Wall with CNC Sidewalls
Tektro Aurigo Pro Hydraulic Disc Brake, 180/160mm rotor
Tektro Aurigo Pro Hydraulic Disc Brake Lever
Fuji Custom 1 1/8" - 1 1/2" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Oval M200 15mm Sweep Double Butted 6061 Riser Bar 31.8mm
